text: GSB Students are scattered throughout EV and Munger - why not all together?
officialReply:
This is an interesting idea. It's hard to create a 'neighborhood' like you suggest right now because Grad Student housing is tabling any changes until the new housing comes online in two years. As that comes online we will bring this up.

The other issue we'll have to figure out here is that not everyone will be in the neighborhood because of variability in the housing numbers.

text: Can we get a GSB-wide contact sheet?
Convenient Stanford Grocery Store
No Late Night Food Options
Can we move 8am fall lead labs to 1pm?
Coupa Coffee is really small for how expensive it is...
Portion sizes at Arbuckle are pretty small, can we add an XL size?
Stanford bus schedule doesn't match the Caltrain schedule
Why is there no IM soccer during the fall or winter! It has to be the most popular sport on campus
Doors to Arbuckle should automatically close, right now it is really drafty
No one at the munger front desk on the weekends makes using one of the shared vacuums difficult.
Can we have more course books to borrow from Stanford library or even to take copies and study in the library
Can we get audio recordings of cases?
officialReply: The office of accessible education has the ability to convert text files into audio files, which could be one solution (search for SCRIBE).

text: The fish and salad combo is awesome, I would get that everyday if it changed each day!

Salad bar items could be improved, for example look at sweet greens menu in downtown PA or Dig In in NYC and add those types of food. E.g. Warm quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, kale, portobello mix, wa
An airport shuttle on Friday evenings
Salad bar should stay open all day in Arbuckle - why do they close it?
officialReply: We've tried leaving it open later and unfortunately there isn't enough usage to pay for the extra people it requires to maintain the salad bar... perhaps we could leave it open on specific days when we know there would be more usage - leave a recommendation in the comments if you have any ideas!

text: Need checks and balances on Small Group Dinner funding
Need pavement or gravel on path between gerona road and dish entrance - is a complete mud pit
Dual Degree students have a hard time finding housing because they are not here for a full year
The Wifi around Bass and Arbuckle simply sucks. Wifi in highland hall, munger, and classrooms is very patchy as well.
Can we add whiteboards to study rooms / lounges in Highland
Course evaluations for compressed courses aren't available for enough time. Didn't get opportunity to provide feedback for compressed course (that needs it).
I wish they had mint or chai tea in the Highland/Schwab coffee areas
We should switch from the forced mean system which mandates low passes. We can still have commendations for high grades, but there is no need to put students on academic probation for low passes.
Foundations classes need to coordinate on not having overlapping material. I've heard about the lemons problem three times in the last two weeks in three different classes
Can we get better pump up music at the Arillaga gym? Hip hop or top 40 please!
In arbuckle, let us get the custom salad WITHOUT the fish for a lower price
No 8am exams please
Love the music in arbuckle and town square, but NO MORE LAME ELEVATOR MUSIC. Have some class GSB
You Choose! Drink & Snack Selection in Arbuckle
The curve shouldn't force students to receive a low pass if they get above a certain absolute grade % (e.g. 75%)
Stanford GSB should have a plan with concrete steps for raising our US news school ranking
DeMarzo should be weaved into the core as a required class that spans two quarters. People shouldn't leave here w/o learning to model, and it doesn't need to be such an all-consuming experience.
Add lights on the sidewalk path between Highland and Schwab - students frequently trip and fall at night
Increase the amount of veggies at the Arbuckle Action Items station. Feels like mostly rice or noodles today and I usually have to ask for extra.
Vote here for AC vs. Heat in GSB Residences
I wish there were a convenience store equivalent on campus
Bring in more professors + courses focusing on biotech. Software is great but there's so much more out there.
Can you please an explanation for how the small group dinner lottery algorithm works?
Can we get larger serving spoons for the Arbuckle salad station? If we're paying by weight, I dont get why the spoons are so small. Pretty sure they contribute to the line moving so slowly.
There is absolutely no security entering Schwab from the back courtyard. Seems to defeat the purpose of having key cards in the side doors and a front desk if anyone can get into the Schwab buildings
why does it take so long to get a physical therapy appointment through vaden? seems like cardinal care should cover being able to get in within a couple of days, but I've been told it takes weeks.

We need a mini-mart or kiosk that sells basic groceries closer to the residences where we can buy milk/toast/etc instead of having to go to a grocery store or Tressider for a single item. Just basic t
Gsb printers do not have the option to home punch and staple.
Move 8:30 - 11:20 classes to 9am - 11:50. I promise we will participate more if you let us sleep in!

GSB seats aren't very comfortable or supporting, and the desks are very high. Is anyone else generally uncomfortable in class? Some days I have to sit in the same seat for 5 hours in a row and it's painful.
We should be able to provide course feedback AFTER the final exam
Can we test providing better vegetarian protein options than tofu?
Need to have a formal process for allowing missed classes for interviews. The goal of GSB is to get a job, and scheduling interviews that never conflict is impossible.
Want more widespread acceptance of using tablets to take notes in class
Require professors to publish numeric  cutoffs and numbers of grades in each category for every class.
Need a white zone or pickup zone in front of Highland for Uber and Lyft pickups.
officialReply: This is coming! As part of the construction at Serra and Campus. Will try to get an ETA.

move schwab and highland move out date to after graduation.
